ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors would like to thank the department of health in the US with available data on demographics such as race/ethnicity for COVID-19 cases and mortality and would encourage all states department of health to collect and provide access to demographic information in COVID-19. Additionally, we are extremely grateful to Pat Oceanic, for her assistance in enhancing the collaborative effort of the research team and for her insightful comments on the recommendations of these findings. April Aguilera deserves thanks for the coordination of the communication in the research team.
